inclusion.criterion: DSM-5 diagnosis of Autism Spectrum Disorder
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fewer than 60% continent days or more than 1 incontinent day/7
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Medication free or on stable medication
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of a known medical condition interfering with anal control
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Current serious behavioral problem or psychiatric condition requiring treatment
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Clostridium difficile colitis and a current serious behavioral problem, making them likely ineligible for the trial.
